RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: select notc_name,notc_desc from OLTB_FPML_NOTC_MAPPING where NOTC_REGEN_REQD='Y'
select notc_name,esn, event_code from oltb_fpml_msg_out where reference_no = ? and msg_status IN ('G','H') and notc_name IS NOT NULL AND NOTC_NAME <> 'cancel'

select m.contract_ref_no from oltbs_contract_master m,oltbs_contract c where m.contract_ref_no = c.contract_ref_no and m.contract_ref_no <> ? and (c.contract_status = 'A' OR (c.contract_status = 'L' AND m.maturity_date <= ?)) AND m.tranche_ref_no = ? AND m.value_date <= ? AND m.contract_ref_no NOT IN (SELECT drawdown_ref_no FROM oltms_fpml_adhoc_msg_dd where TRANCHE_REF_NO = ? AND EVENT_SEQ_NO = ?)

SELECT z.customer_name1,p.participant FROM sttms_core_customer z, lbtbs_contract_participant p WHERE (z.customer_no = p.participant OR z.customer_no = (SELECT portfolio FROM tltms_position_identifier WHERE position_identifier = p.participant)) AND p.event_seq_no = (SELECT MAX(event_seq_no) FROM lbtbs_contract_participant WHERE contract_ref_no = p.contract_ref_no AND value_date = p.value_date) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM cstms_udf_vals WHERE function_id = 'STDCIF' AND field_name = 'MEICODE' AND rtrim(rec_key,'~') = z.customer_no) AND p.value_date <= ? AND z.RECORD_STAT='O' and z.AUTH_STAT AND p.contract_ref_no = ? AND customer_no NOT IN (SELECT participant FROM oltms_fpml_adhoc_msg_part WHERE TRANCHE_REF_NO = ? AND event_seq_no = ?)
